author: Clement
title: Shamar Leggette Who Robbed Flashy Brooklyn Bishop Lamor Whitehead Shot to Death By US Marshals
text: Shamar Leggette is a career criminal suspected of robbing flashy Brooklyn bishop Lamor Whitehead during livestream service and now, he’s been gunned down by the US Marshals in New Jersey. According to reports, Shamar was third on the list of New York’s most wanted fugitives and was killed on Wednesday “during a confrontation with Marshals who were attempting to arrest him for the armed robbery”. [READ ALSO: 39-Year-Old Draya Michele is Allegedly Pregnant By 21-Year-Old Rockets Jalen Green](https://blacksportsonline.com/2024/01/39-year-old-draya-michele-is-allegedly-pregnant-by-21-year-old-rockets-jalen-green/) [Leggette](https://nypost.com/2024/01/24/metro/shamar-leggette-suspect-in-robbery-of-brooklyn-bishop-lamor-whitehead-shot-dead-by-us-marshals/), 41, fired at officers as he exited the MHO Inn and Suites in Monmouth Junction, where they were waiting to take him into custody, NBC New York reported. A woman he was with inside the hotel surrendered to authorities before Leggette came out shooting, according to the station. Leggette, who has served two stints in state prison, was identified as a suspect in the brazen church robbery last year after his two accomplices were arrested. No sin will go unpunished and that is what has happened to Shamar Leggette who was suspected of robbing Lamor Whitehead during church service. It was scary! With that being said Whitehead has his own things to worry about because the [feds are investigating him for scamming.](https://blacksportsonline.com/2022/12/bishop-lamor-whitehead-arrested-by-fbi-for-scamming-his-congregation-so-he-could-buy-luxury-goods-and-clothing-for-himself/) Flip to the next page for photos of Shamar Leggette…
